response.overview: A group of teenage girls grappling with the revolutionary power of imagination. A surreal immersion in a fantasy film takes us inside the life and imagination of six girls from Sassari. Whether they listen to Balkan music or Tailor Swift they present themselves in their way and bring their incredible film to life. They want to save the world, we don't know if they will succeed or not. A shared path of fantastic and real youth is drawn in an alternation of city streets and black holes of the imagination.
response.title: The World Saved by Girls
